item.title: Alhambra Tiles
item.description: The Alhambra tiles A few years ago I visited the Alhambra in Granada, Spain. I was fascinated by the beautiful tiles, by their geometric patterns and repetitive colours. Here is one with overlapping white ribbons wrapped around blue, black and orange octogons: This one is formed by repeated rectangular shapes, darkly coloured in one direction, white in the orthogonal direction: And this one with its stars and wings is known as the Nasrid little bird:
